about_the_game:
Kaal Yoddha

An action-adventure journey rooted in the mythic heritage of ancient India. Assume the mantle of Prince Avyaan—a warrior guided by courage and curiosity—summoned to a distant island beset by a sinister threat.

A Looming Curse

  • Traverse eerie forests, decaying temples, and hidden caverns where the line between reality and illusion fades.

  • Unearthed relic from a bygone era, hinting at a power once revered—and now awakened to perilous effect.

  • Observe the land’s inhabitants as they grapple with an unknown force that twists their very nature.

Prince Avyaan’s Path

  • Brave the Unknown: Venture into the island’s heart to confront a spreading corruption consuming everything in its path.

  • Confront the Darkness: Descend into foreboding depths and stand firm against the malevolent presence shaping the island’s fate.

Key Features

  • Dynamic Combat & Exploration: Engage in close-quarters clashes or strike from afar with your bow, adapting on the fly to evolving threats.

  • Environmental Storytelling: Piece together the island’s hidden past by uncovering ancient murals, cryptic notes, and the remnants of a once-thriving community.

  • Platforming & Puzzle Solving: Scale towering cliffs, navigate treacherous pathways, and outsmart traps to forge deeper into the unknown.

  • Epic Encounters: Test your mettle against formidable adversaries, each standing as a testament to the curse’s unyielding power.

Will you endure the island’s trials and unearth the secret behind its affliction, or falter before the mounting darkness? Take up Prince Avyaan’s blade and chart your own legend in a realm where the might of ancient forces meets the resolve of the human spirit.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and blood.

name: Kaal Yoddha

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10300H CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 - 4 GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: not available
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12700H CPU @ 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 - 12GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: not available

short_description: Kaal Yoddha is an action-adventure game steeped in the mythic heritage of ancient India. Step into the role of Prince Avyaan, a skilled warrior driven by curiosity and valor, as he answers a mysterious plea for help from a remote island besieged by a terrifying curse.
